title: NITB showcases Pakistan’s digital transformation at GITEX 2025
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 13 (APP):For the first time, the National Information Technology Board (NITB) is participating in GITEX 2025 — one of the world’s largest technology exhibitions — to showcase the government of Pakistan’s key digital transformation initiatives.
During the event, NITB will present its flagship digital platforms, including e-Office, a robust and secure system that enables paperless governance across all federal ministries and departments.
Other major initiatives to be featured include the Cabinet Portal, PakApp, Government-to-Government (G2G) and Government-to-Citizen (G2C) digital services, as well as the One Patient, One ID health initiative.
